# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/angular-animate`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Angular JS (ngAnimate module) (http://angularjs.org).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/angular-animate

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 06 Dec 2016 19:04:27 GMT
 * Library Dependencies: jquery
 * Module Dependencies: angular
 * Global values: none
